3/ lastly, protecting your principal may not matter as much if you only have a small % of your net worth in #crypto . At that point, you’re either very wealthy & already diversified, or you’re just getting started in these markets, in which case: average in.
2/ This doesn’t make you a “non-believer,” though it may require marginally violating the law of #hodl for your own psychological good. The #crypto gods will forgive you.

On protecting your principal (or "cost"). If your portfolio has gone: 100x, then cost = 1% 50x, then cost = 2% 20x, then cost = 5% 10x, then cost = 10% If you decide to protect your cost, Put it in an asset uncorrelated to #crypto .
2/ After a certain hurdle it can be healthy to take your cost out of #crypto , thereby protecting your principal. Makes the knuckles a little less white sometimes.
